content: शतिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) शत्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शतेन क्रोतः शतस्य विकारः तस्यायं वा इति ठन् यत् वा] {@--1@} Containing or consisting of a hundred; <ls>Y. 2. 208.</ls> {@--2@} Relating to a hundred. {@--3@} Effected with a hundred. {@--4@} Bought with a hundred. {@--5@} Changed with or for a hundred. {@--6@} Bearing tax or interest per hundred. {@--7@} Indicative of (the acquisition of) a hundred.
